::Killfest::

Killfest looks down at DrillBit and shrugs. "From what I know about the planet, their base doesn't look too powerful. I think we'll easilly succeed."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He turns back to Killfest.
> "What do you think? Is it going to work in your appinion, or will are
> allies here get scraped?"
